Trade/Device Name(s): On-Call™ Multi-Drug Home Test Cup for Marijuana, Cocaine, Amphetamine, Methamphetamine, Ecstasy, Opiates, and Phencyclidine
Regulation Name(s): Marijuana, Cocaine, Amphetamine, Methamphetamine, Ecstasy, Opiates, and Phencyclidine test system
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for On-Call Multi-Drug Home Test Cup for qualitative urine screening of seven drugs of abuse using lateral flow immunoassay technology
Indications for Use Summary: Rapid over-the-counter urine screening for Marijuana, Cocaine, Amphetamine, Methamphetamine, Ecstasy, Opiates, and Phencyclidine, providing preliminary results that require confirmatory GC/MS testing for positives
